name: [Neolithic]TtE MEGA MINUTIAE 2021 JAM Edition
description:
It's a combination of 

RPG Maker XP (for development)  + RPG Maker VXA (for better performance) + RGD (for better graphics render speed.)

Bonus Art Assets:

There is a Chinese opera actor free for use.

It's made for RPG Maker XP, containing a character walk image, face image, and a battle image. The walk image can be directly imported, the face can be displayed as a picture. But, the battle image may need some editing or at least change format for a default RMXP to use.

Credit "orochi2k" if you use them in your project.
